ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:48:53 [Issue ID 4000-182169] urn:comicvine:4000-182169 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 11:14:09. [Issue ID 886176]
ComicInfo.Summary: For most of the past of Budd Root’s Cavewoman comic and its titular heroine, Meriem Cooper, the main attraction has been its good-girl art and sometimes naughty humor and action. This one-shot goes a little beyond risqué to raunchy, as Meriem graces each short adventure and pinup either half-naked or totally naked. The special also features Frank Cho characters (and one sketch) along with Root’s perception on a assortment of other heroes, heroines, and monsters.
ComicInfo.Title: Cavewoman Meets The Grandson Of Khong
